sense.def: Pathological Condition of xian ji 癇疾 , epilepsy ailment, classified into six categories based on peculariaties in their appearances and their similarities with certain domestic animals. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry long chi 龍齒：六畜齒治六癇，皆比類之義也 , “Resorting to teeth from the six types of domestic animals to cure the six types of epilep sy is always based on the idea that [patient appearance and animal appearance] constitute one category”.
